alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 23 at 5:41PM MST until August 23 at 8:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 845 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 541 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Wagner Wash, Hartman Wash, Flying E Wash, Sols Wash, San Domingo Wash, Monarch Wash, Cemetery Wash, Dead Horse Wash, Hassayampa River - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Surprise, Buckeye, Wickenburg, Circle City, Wittmann and Morristown. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
